synonyms: kuṇḍera—of the lake; mādhurī—sweetness; yena—as if; rādhāra—of Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; madhurimā—sweetness; kuṇḍera—of the lake; mahimā—glories; yena—as if; rādhāra—of Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; mahimā—glories.
translation: "The attraction of Rādhā-kuṇḍa is as sweet as that of Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī. Similarly, the glories of the kuṇḍa [lake] are as glorious as Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī.
